org.dgfoundation.amp.reports.xml

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.reports.xml.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object

    Java class for settings complex type.

    The following schema fragment specifies the expected content contained within this class. 

     <complexType name="settings">
   <complexContent>
     <restriction base="{http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema}anyType">
       <sequence>
         <element name="currency-code" type="{http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema}string"/>
         <element name="calendar-id" type="{http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema}int"/>
         <element name="year-range" type="{http://www.developmentgateway.org/amp/reports}yearRange"/>
         <element name="amount-format" type="{http://www.developmentgateway.org/amp/reports}amountFormat"/>
       </sequence>
     </restriction>
   </complexContent>
 </complexType>
